verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about on the day<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> had finished<WH3615> setting<WH6965> up the tabernacle,<WH4908> he anointed<WH4886> it and consecrated<WH6942> it with all<WH3605> its furnishings<WH3627> and the altar<WH4196> and all<WH3605> its utensils;<WH3627> he anointed<WH4886> them and consecrated<WH6942> them also.

Then the leaders<WH5387> of Israel,<WH3478> the heads<WH7218> of their fathers' households,<WH1004> made<WH7126> an offering<WH7126> (they were the leaders<WH5387> of the tribes;<WH4294> they were the ones who were over<WH5921> the numbered<WH6485> men).

When they brought<WH935> their offering<WH7133> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> six<WH8337> covered<WH6632> carts<WH5699> and twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> oxen,<WH1241> a cart<WH5699> for [every] two<WH8147> of the leaders<WH5387> and an ox<WH7794> for each one,<WH259> then they presented<WH7126> them before<WH6440> the tabernacle.<WH4908>
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Accept<WH3947> [these things] from them, that they may be used<WH5647> in the service<WH5656> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and you shall give<WH5414> them to the Levites,<WH3881> [to] each<WH376> man<WH376> according<WH6310> to his service.<WH5656>"
So Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the carts<WH5699> and the oxen,<WH1241> and gave<WH5414> them to the Levites.<WH3881>
Two<WH8147> carts<WH5699> and four<WH702> oxen<WH1241> he gave<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of Gershon,<WH1648> according<WH6310> to their service,<WH5656>

and four<WH702> carts<WH5699> and eight<WH8083> oxen<WH1241> he gave<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> according<WH6310> to their service,<WH5656> under the direction<WH3027> of Ithamar<WH385> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest.<WH3548>

But he did not give<WH5414> [any] to the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> because<WH3588> theirs<WH5921> <WH1992> [was] the service<WH5656> of the holy<WH6944> [objects, which] they carried<WH5375> on the shoulder.<WH3802>

And the leaders<WH5387> offered<WH7126> the dedication<WH2598> [offering<WH7133>] for the altar<WH4196> when<WH3117> it was anointed,<WH4886> so the leaders<WH5387> offered<WH7126> their offering before<WH6440> the altar.<WH4196>

Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Let them present<WH7126> their offering,<WH7133> one<WH259> leader<WH5387> each<WH259> day,<WH3117> for the dedication<WH2598> of the altar.<WH4196>"
Now the one who presented<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> on the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> [was] Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab,<WH5992> of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah;<WH3063>

and his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab.<WH5992>
On the second<WH8145> day<WH3117> Nethanel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar,<WH6686> leader<WH5387> of Issachar,<WH3485> presented<WH7126> [an offering;]

he presented<WH7126> as his offering<WH7133> one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Nethanel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar.<WH6686>
On the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> [it was] Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon,<WH2497> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Zebulun;<WH2074>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> young<WH1121> bull,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon.<WH2497>
On the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> [it was] Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur,<WH7707> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Reuben;<WH7205>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur.<WH7707>
On the fifth<WH2549> day<WH3117> [it was] Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai,<WH6701> leader<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon;<WH8095>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai.<WH6701>
On the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> [it was] Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Deuel,<WH1845> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Gad;<WH1410>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Deuel.<WH1845>
On the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> [it was] Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud,<WH5989> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Ephraim;<WH669>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud.<WH5989>
On the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> [it was] Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur,<WH6301> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Manasseh;<WH4519>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur.<WH6301>
On the ninth<WH8671> day<WH3117> [it was] Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni,<WH1441> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin;<WH1144>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni.<WH1441>
On the tenth<WH6224> day<WH3117> [it was] Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai,<WH5996> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Dan;<WH1835>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai.<WH5996>
On the eleventh<WH6249> <WH6240> day<WH3117> [it was] Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ochran,<WH5918> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Asher;<WH836>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one<WH3967> hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ochran.<WH5918>
On the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> day<WH3117> [it was] Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan,<WH5881> leader<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Naphtali;<WH5321>

his offering<WH7133> [was] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> whose weight<WH4948> [was] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels,<WH8255>] one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels, according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> for a grain offering;<WH4503>
one<WH259> gold<WH2091> pan<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> [shekels,] full<WH4392> of incense;<WH7004>
one<WH259> bull<WH6499>,<WH1121> <WH1241> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old,<WH1121> for a burnt<WH5930> offering;<WH5930>
one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering;<WH9128>

and for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams,<WH352> five<WH2568> male<WH6260> goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old.<WH1121> This<WH2088> [was] the offering<WH7133> of Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan.<WH5881>

This<WH2088> [was] the dedication<WH2598> [offering] for the altar<WH4196> from the leaders<WH5387> of Israel<WH3478> when<WH3117> it was anointed:<WH4886> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> silver<WH3701> dishes,<WH7086> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> silver<WH3701> bowls,<WH4219> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> gold<WH2091> pans,<WH3709>

each<WH259> silver<WH3701> dish<WH7086> [weighing] one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> [shekels] and each<WH259> bowl<WH4219> seventy;<WH7657> all<WH3605> the silver<WH3701> of the utensils<WH3627> [was] 2400 [shekels,] according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary;<WH6944>

the twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> gold<WH2091> pans,<WH3709> full<WH4392> of incense,<WH7004> [weighing] ten<WH6235> [shekels] apiece,<WH6235> according to the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> all<WH3605> the gold<WH2091> of the pans<WH3709> <WH120> [shekels;]

all<WH3605> the oxen<WH1241> for the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> bulls,<WH6499> [all] the rams<WH352> twelve,<WH8147> <WH6240> the male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old<WH1121> with their grain offering<WH4503> twelve,<WH8147> <WH6240> and the male<WH8163> goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> twelve<WH8147>;<WH6240>

and all<WH3605> the oxen<WH1241> for the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> <WH24> <WH6242> <WH702> bulls,<WH6499> [all] the rams<WH352>,<WH60> <WH8346> the male<WH6260> goats<WH6260>,<WH60> <WH8346> the male<WH3532> lambs<WH3532> one year<WH8141> old<WH1121>.<WH60> <WH8346> This<WH2088> [was] the dedication<WH2598> [offering] for the altar<WH4196> after<WH310> it was anointed.<WH4886>

Now when Moses<WH4872> went<WH935> into the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> to speak<WH1696> with Him, he heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> speaking<WH1696> to him from above<WH5921> the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> that was on the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> from between<WH996> the two<WH8147> cherubim,<WH3742> so He spoke<WH1696> to him.
